summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Sriram Divi portfolio website. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend sections loading correctly with proper navigation, theme toggle, and responsive design. Contact form integration working with backend.

ui_bugs.issue: Mobile menu toggle button has viewport click issues in automated testing

integration_issues.issue: Success message not clearly visible after form submission, though backend receives data correctly

design_issues.issue: Marquee animation element not found with expected selector

passed_tests: Backend /api/contact accepts POST requests and stores data
Homepage loads with hero section showing 'Sriram Divi' name
Theme toggle switches between dark and light modes
All navigation links present (About, Projects, Skills, Experience, Contact)
Download Resume button links to correct PDF file
Social links (GitHub, LinkedIn, Email) are correct and clickable
About section displays with terminal-style code block
Projects section shows project cards with working filter tabs (All, Frontend, Backend, DevOps)
Skills section displays skill categories with progress bars
Experience timeline shows 4 work experience cards
Contact form fields are present and fillable
Contact form submits data to backend successfully
Mobile menu toggle button is present
Responsive design adapts to mobile viewport
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI improvements: 1) Ensure contact form success message is more visible after submission, 2) Verify skills marquee animation is working properly, 3) Fix mobile menu click issues for better mobile UX

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major functionality working, minor UI polish needed
